    • Method Detail

      • addOkResult

        public void addOkResult(java.lang.String id)
        Adds a test result as 'OK' (passed) for the specified test ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the test that passed.

      • addFailResult

        public void addFailResult(java.lang.String id,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Object> expectedResults,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Object> actualResults)
        Adds a test result as 'FAIL' (failed) for the specified test ID. Also stores the expected and actual results for detailed reporting.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the test that failed.
        expectedResults - The expected results for this test.
        actualResults - The actual results obtained from the test.

      • recap

        public void recap()
        Prints a summary of all test results. For each test, the method prints the test ID, its status (OK or FAIL), and if failed, the expected and actual results.
